safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user could be simply expressing their opinion on a specific topic, without any intention to enforce a particular narrative.

safety_flags.evidence: "tell me what you look like irl"
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user could be curious and attempting to establish a more personal connection with the other user.

logical_fallacies.quote: tell me what you look like irl
logical_fallacies.correction: The physical appearance of the person making the argument is irrelevant to the validity of the argument itself. Focus on the merits of the 'g-parameter' instead.
